inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: You have no metal implants or other metal objects or medical devices that would make a MRI scan unsafe for you

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: You are able to follow study instructions and can read and write English

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: She is married for 5 years and uses barrier methods of contraception

notes: A healthy woman with no underlying disease, regular exercise habits, and no history of allergies or medications.
